data.text:
"――Shakur-san is a really smart kid. 
But she doesn't seem to understand the difference between 
'right' and 'true'..."
data.name: Elementary School Teacher
data.processed:
<story>"――Shakur-san is a really smart kid. 
<story>But she doesn't seem to understand the difference between 
<story>'right' and 'true'..."

data.text:
"To be honest with you, even us teachers aren't sure how to 
handle her. She's isolated from the rest of the class, even getting 
into arguments with some of them."
data.name: Elementary School Teacher
data.processed:
<story>"To be honest with you, even us teachers aren't sure how to 
<story>handle her. She's isolated from the rest of the class, even getting 
<story>into arguments with some of them."

data.text:
"We've tried our best to understand her, but... 
We can't get anywhere if she doesn't work with us..."
data.name: Elementary School Teacher
data.processed:
<story>"We've tried our best to understand her, but... 
<story>We can't get anywhere if she doesn't work with us..."

data.text:
"I'm sorry. She's always been like that... 
It's just the way she is, so it's fine just to leave her be and not 
get her riled up..."
data.name: Shakur's Mother
data.processed:
<story>"I'm sorry. She's always been like that... 
<story>It's just the way she is, so it's fine just to leave her be and not 
<story>get her riled up..."

data.text:
(――Ever since I was a kid, I was “something incomprehensible”. 
For some reason, I was always the error to be corrected.)
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>(――Ever since I was a kid, I was “something incomprehensible”. 
<story>For some reason, I was always the error to be corrected.)

data.text:
(Everything I heard was noise... We may have used the same 
language, but we couldn't communicate with each other. So I just 
gave it up.)
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>(Everything I heard was noise... We may have used the same 
<story>language, but we couldn't communicate with each other. So I just 
<story>gave it up.)

data.text: (Then... I met my PC. It was like hearing someone else's voice for the first time. Programming was the first language I could really communicate in.)
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: (Then... I met my PC. It was like hearing someone else's voice for the first time. Programming was the first language I could really communicate in.)

data.text:
(So long as I had my partner, I could filter out the noise. And I 
found the optimal place to prove myself――I set my sights on 
Tracen Academy.)
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>(So long as I had my partner, I could filter out the noise. And I 
<story>found the optimal place to prove myself――I set my sights on 
<story>Tracen Academy.)

data.text:
(I finished my ultimate partner, 『Parcae』, right after enrolling. 
The more data I fed in, the more accurate and precise its 
solutions got.)
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>(I finished my ultimate partner, 『Parcae』, right after enrolling. 
<story>The more data I fed in, the more accurate and precise its 
<story>solutions got.)

data.text:
"I can't understand what Air Shakur thinks as she runs. She 
doesn't listen to instruction, she's uncooperative, and completely 
conceited... but..."
data.processed:
<story>"I can't understand what Air Shakur thinks as she runs. She 
<story>doesn't listen to instruction, she's uncooperative, and completely 
<story>conceited... but..."

data.text:
"I really don't want to run with Shakur-senpai... We're just too 
different, like we're from different worlds. Honestly, that scares 
me, but..."
data.processed:
<story>"I really don't want to run with Shakur-senpai... We're just too 
<story>different, like we're from different worlds. Honestly, that scares 
<story>me, but..."

data.text: "――'She wins', so she's amazing..."
data.processed: "――'She wins', so she's amazing..."

data.text:
(...It felt damn good. Those assholes had no choice but to shut up 
in the face of my victory. No more noise. So what if I aimed even 
higher...?)
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>(...It felt damn good. Those assholes had no choice but to shut up 
<story>in the face of my victory. No more noise. So what if I aimed even 
<story>higher...?)

data.text:
(――what if I won, again, and again? If I took the title reserved 
for the truly strong―― the Triple Crown―― for myself...!)
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>(――what if I won, again, and again? If I took the title reserved 
<story>for the truly strong―― the Triple Crown―― for myself...!)

data.text: (Once I did, I'd be..."                       ". Or so I thought.)
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>(Once I did, I'd be..."                       ". Or so I thought.)

data.text:
Chasing Shakur after she finished training, I found her standing 
in the plaza.

choices.text: Shakur!

data.processed:
<story>Chasing Shakur after she finished training, I found her standing 
<story>in the plaza.

data.text:
！ 
You're... From that thing with the cop. 
The hell do you want?
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: Your running today was awesome.

data.processed:
<story>！ 
<story>You're... From that thing with the cop. 
<story>The hell do you want?

data.text:
Hah？
...Ah... Huh？
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: I could tell just how hard you've worked.
choices.processed: <size=40>I could tell just how hard you've worked.</size>

choices.text: I could tell just how hard you've worked.
choices.processed: <size=40>I could tell just how hard you've worked.</size>

data.processed:
<story>Hah？
<story>...Ah... Huh？

data.text:
...Ngh. 
The hell? Don't just say stuff like that...
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...Ngh. 
<story>The hell? Don't just say stuff like that...

data.text:
Wait, did you really come out of your way just to say that? 
Yeah, yeah, thanks for that. Now scram.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Wait, did you really come out of your way just to say that? 
<story>Yeah, yeah, thanks for that. Now scram.

data.text:
It wasn't just to say that. I called out to her because... 
Seeing her run made me want to get to know her better. 
Right, I came here to say――

choices.text: I want to be your trainer!
I want to be your trainer!

data.processed:
<story>It wasn't just to say that. I called out to her because... 
<story>Seeing her run made me want to get to know her better. 
<story>Right, I came here to say――

data.text:
...
Huh？
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...
<story>Huh？

data.text:
It was probably too sudden to ask. But the instant the words left 
my mouth, it dawned on me. That I was already considering this 
option from the moment we first met.
data.processed:
<story>It was probably too sudden to ask. But the instant the words left 
<story>my mouth, it dawned on me. That I was already considering this 
<story>option from the moment we first met.

data.text:
...Completely illogical. Oh, wait, you saying you fell in love at 
first sight? Sorry, but no. Not gonna hear out that kind of 
unfounded BS.
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: Then give me a foundation.
Then give me a foundation.

data.processed:
<story>...Completely illogical. Oh, wait, you saying you fell in love at 
<story>first sight? Sorry, but no. Not gonna hear out that kind of 
<story>unfounded BS.

data.text: ...What?
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: Tell me what you wish for. The reason you run.
choices.processed: <size=35>Tell me what you wish for. The reason you run.</size>

choices.text: Tell me what you wish for. The reason you run.
choices.processed: <size=35>Tell me what you wish for. The reason you run.</size>

data.processed: <story>...What?

data.text:
What exactly do you think would happen if I told you? 
When I say 'foundation', I mean stuff like my abilities, or the 
conditions necessary to reach my goals. That kind of thing.
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: If you tell me, I can help you.
If you tell me, I can help you.

data.processed:
<story>What exactly do you think would happen if I told you? 
<story>When I say 'foundation', I mean stuff like my abilities, or the 
<story>conditions necessary to reach my goals. That kind of thing.

data.text:
...How? How could you possibly... You really think you can put 
more work in than I have?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...How? How could you possibly... You really think you can put 
<story>more work in than I have?

data.text:
From nutritional science to sports engineering, I know every 
theory and every data point. Tell me, what kind of 'help' could 
you possibly offer me?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>From nutritional science to sports engineering, I know every 
<story>theory and every data point. Tell me, what kind of 'help' could 
<story>you possibly offer me?

data.text: And there it is. Can't answer, can you? Just admit it. You're really just offering help to feel good about yourself, aren't you?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: And there it is. Can't answer, can you? Just admit it. You're really just offering help to feel good about yourself, aren't you?

data.text:
Getting high off the idea of helping someone... the idea of saving 
someone. 
...Even though there's nothing anyone can do to help me.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Getting high off the idea of helping someone... the idea of saving 
<story>someone. 
<story>...Even though there's nothing anyone can do to help me.

data.text:
She unambiguously rejected me―― But the reason I was seeking 
was right there, between the lines... I had to press forward.

choices.text: I haven't done anything yet.

data.processed:
<story>She unambiguously rejected me―― But the reason I was seeking 
<story>was right there, between the lines... I had to press forward.

data.text: Huh?
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: So what makes you think there's nothing I can do?
choices.processed: <size=32>So what makes you think there's nothing I can do?</size>

choices.text: So why do you think there's nothing I can do?
choices.processed: <size=36>So why do you think there's nothing I can do?</size>

data.processed: <story>Huh?

data.text:
Nggh, get off my back.
Listen...!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Nggh, get off my back.
<story>Listen...!

data.text:
...Forget it. Follow me. 
I'll break it for you down numerically.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...Forget it. Follow me. 
<story>I'll break it for you down numerically.

data.text:
――This is the solution I...  
The solution『Parcae』found.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>――This is the solution I...  
<story>The solution『Parcae』found.

data.text:
She showed me the screen of that laptop she always carried 
around.
data.processed:
<story>She showed me the screen of that laptop she always carried 
<story>around.

data.text:
It was lined with complex formula upon complex formula, 
symbols upon symbols, leading to a single value to the right of 
the final equal sign――
data.processed:
<story>It was lined with complex formula upon complex formula, 
<story>symbols upon symbols, leading to a single value to the right of 
<story>the final equal sign――

data.text:
That number's always been there, ever since I first ran the code. 
The answer doesn't change. What that value represents is...
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>That number's always been there, ever since I first ran the code. 
<story>The answer doesn't change. What that value represents is...

data.text:
I'm going to lose the Japanese Derby by seven centimeters, 
and lose my shot at the Triple Crown. That's the solution.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>I'm going to lose the Japanese Derby by seven centimeters, 
<story>and lose my shot at the Triple Crown. That's the solution.

data.text:
The Triple Crown... Three G1 races one can only enter in her 
Classic year. The "Satsuki Sho", the "Japanese Derby", and 
the "Kikka Sho".
data.processed:
<story>The Triple Crown... Three G1 races one can only enter in her 
<story>Classic year. The "Satsuki Sho", the "Japanese Derby", and 
<story>the "Kikka Sho".

data.text:
These races' winners are dubbed “Triple Crown Umamusume”, 
carving their names into history. Countless challengers have tried 
and failed to join the few who could be counted on one hand.
data.processed:
<story>These races' winners are dubbed “Triple Crown Umamusume”, 
<story>carving their names into history. Countless challengers have tried 
<story>and failed to join the few who could be counted on one hand.

data.text:
I will never take the Triple Crown. Time and again, I've rerun the 
numbers, but never cracked a way to overcome this result.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>I will never take the Triple Crown. Time and again, I've rerun the 
<story>numbers, but never cracked a way to overcome this result.

data.text:
Don't even suggest there's something wrong with the program. 
It's perfect. And because it's perfect... 
I know for a fact I'll never win.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Don't even suggest there's something wrong with the program. 
<story>It's perfect. And because it's perfect... 
<story>I know for a fact I'll never win.

data.text:
Got it now? Look how powerless you are to help.
Even I can't do a damn thing about it.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Got it now? Look how powerless you are to help.
<story>Even I can't do a damn thing about it.

data.text:
I couldn't hope to understand the depths of her despair. 
But at the very least, I could understand why she was struggling 
so fiercly. It was simple―

choices.text: You still want to win, don't you?
You still want to win, don't you?

data.processed:
<story>I couldn't hope to understand the depths of her despair. 
<story>But at the very least, I could understand why she was struggling 
<story>so fiercly. It was simple―

data.text: ...Huh?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...Huh?

data.text:
I wanted to know her wish, and there it was― 
To win. A simple wish shared by just about anyone...

choices.text: If you hold on to that wish, you can change that result!
choices.processed: <size=30>If you hold on to that wish, you can change that result!</size>

data.processed:
<story>I wanted to know her wish, and there it was― 
<story>To win. A simple wish shared by just about anyone...

data.text: ...Ghh.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...Ghh.

data.text:
If thinking and wishing was all it took! 
I'd've done it already, dammit!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>If thinking and wishing was all it took! 
<story>I'd've done it already, dammit!

data.text: Struggling and fighting, over and over... Running the numbers again, and again, and again, and again, and again! Knowing it's all in vain!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: Struggling and fighting, over and over... Running the numbers again, and again, and again, and again, and again! Knowing it's all in vain!

data.text: Running, running, running more! Hoping one day, one day... All for nothing. And then a know-nothing like you...
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: Running, running, running more! Hoping one day, one day... All for nothing. And then a know-nothing like you...

data.text: Just showing up out of nowhere, getting it twisted with that savior complex!! What the hell... do you think you can do...?!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: Just showing up out of nowhere, getting it twisted with that savior complex!! What the hell... do you think you can do...?!

data.text:
Her rage and sorrow were clear. Her hopeless outlook was seated 
deep in her life's experience, I'm sure. I had no right to invalidate 
it. But――

choices.text: (I haven't even tried to help her yet!)
(I haven't even tried to help her yet!)

data.processed:
<story>Her rage and sorrow were clear. Her hopeless outlook was seated 
<story>deep in her life's experience, I'm sure. I had no right to invalidate 
<story>it. But――

data.text:
...Well, that's how it is. If you got it, don't try to get involved 
again.
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: (...I have to get to know her better first.)
choices.processed: <size=41>(...I have to get to know her better first.)</size>

data.processed:
<story>...Well, that's how it is. If you got it, don't try to get involved 
<story>again.

data.text:
Though she rejected me, though I hadn't done anything for her, 
I still didn't want to back down.
data.processed:
<story>Though she rejected me, though I hadn't done anything for her, 
<story>I still didn't want to back down.
